DocAttribute.Name: PredefinedType
DocAttribute.Documentation:
A list of types to further identify the object. Some property sets may be specifically applicable to one of these types.
>NOTE If the object has an associated IfcTypeObject with a PredefinedType, then this attribute shall not be used.

DocWhereRule.Name: HasObjectType
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The attribute ObjectType shall be given if the predefined type is set to USERDEFINED.
DocWhereRule.Expression: NOT EXISTS(PredefinedType) OR (PredefinedType <> IfcVirtualElementTypeEnum.USERDEFINED) OR EXISTS(SELF\IfcObject.ObjectType);
